[â‘ ] [chuÃ²]
["Guangyun" is slightly ugly, medicinal, and thorough. ]
Also known as "è¾¶1".
(1) Suddenly walk and stop, hesitate.
(2) Go beyond, go down quickly without order.
(3) Run and walk.
